All Superinterfaces:
IAuditable, IAuditableHandle, IItem, IItemHandle, IManagedItem, IManagedItemHandle, ISyncRuleHandle
public interface ISyncRule
extends ISyncRuleHandle, IAuditable

A synchronization rule defines how external object properties and Jazz item properties are transformed into each other. If an external object is being synchronized with a Jazz item (as opposed to just having some of its state replicated in the Jazz repository), the sync rule defines the association between external properties and Jazz properties, and the names of both Jazz and external "object managers" that know how to read and write the objects being synchronized.

Since:
0.5
